title: Apple’s most affordable iPad has dropped to a crazy low Black Friday price
content:
Macworld

The 10th-gen iPad is Apple’s most affordable model, and it’s a great bargain at its full $349 MSRP. But right now you can get one for a Black Friday bargain of just $259, the very best price we’ve ever seen. That’s a 26 percent discount and an insane deal for a great tablet.

With an A14 Bionic chip, this tablet is ready to help you tackle games, streaming, and even some of your workload since you can easily use it with a Magic Keyboard. This 10.9-inch tablet features a Liquid Retina Display with vibrant colors and deep contrasts for a great visual experience. The battery life on this tablet is described as “all-day,” which we don’t necessarily agree with, as per the tests we ran during our review of the iPad 10th gen. Either way, it should be enough to get you through quite a few hours of fun.

For all those moments when you need to participate in video calls, the iPad features a 12MP Ultra Wide front camera with Center Stage, keeping the focus on you even if you move around. There’s also a 12MP Wide back camera if you want to snap some pics or videos here and there. The only thing it doesn’t have is Apple Intelligence, but with a slow roll-out, you’re not going to be missing out on too much.

So go ahead and add the 10th-gen iPad to your cart for just $259 because once Black Friday is over this deal will be too.

Buy now at Amazon
